title: T.I. In The Trap! W  DCYoungFly And Karlous Miller | Ep. 261
itunes:title: T.I. In The Trap! W  DCYoungFly And Karlous Miller | Ep. 261
description:
The King of the south, the rubberband man, trouble man AKA T.I.P came through the 85 south show trap to kick it with Karlous Miller and DC Young Fly. T.I. to.d stories from his come up and explains what it was like being on set with Denzel Washington in American Gangster. Plus, T.I. talks about the making of ATL - how it had a different title and how Chris Robinson added more scenes before its release. T.I. also weighs in on the election and takes bets! support the show grab some merch https://85apparelco.com/ T.I. has a new album out so broke down the importance of the features on the album and discusses his collaborations with Lil Baby and Young Thug. T.I. also talks about Verzus - going up against Busta Rhymes and Jeezy. You know DC, Karlous and T.I. got to explore their vocabulary. This is the coldest podcast!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
